source:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
This bashful bowman could do with some advice.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
スリザーバウの悩める狩人は、告白するための場所探しをしたいようだ。
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_TODO_03<tab>悩める狩人ともう一度話す

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_000<tab>I realize this is sudden, but would you lend me your ear for a moment? I would rather keep this secret from the others if possible.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_000今度、想いを寄せている人に告白しようと思うんだ。
だけど、さすがにスリザーバウの中で告白するのは、
恥ずかしくて……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_001<tab>I mean to propose to my beloved, and everything needs to be perfect, right down to where I spring the question.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_001だから別の場所で告白しようと考えてるんだけど、
僕だけじゃ決めきれなくてさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_100_001<tab>Being what I presume to be a worldly traveler, I thought perhaps you could give me your opinion on the view from a few places I had in mind.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_100_001君、旅人なんだろう？
なんだか、とっても人生経験豊富そうだよね……。
そうだ、僕と一緒に、告白の舞台を選んでくれないかい？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_002<tab>Good, good. My first choice was a quaint little place to the north. Follow me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_002そうと決まれば、さっそく行動開始だ！
1箇所目の候補は、東の森が見える場所……
さっそく行ってみよう！

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_010<tab>What do you think? I thought the view of Yx'Maja might set the mood.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_010ここが1箇所目の候補さ！
東のイキス・マヤエの森が見える場所なんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_011<tab>A pity we can only view it from afar. I've heard the flowers there are quite beautiful, but the woods there are fiercely guarded.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_011東の森には、ロンカの遺構を守る古き血筋の民が住んでいてね。
森に踏み入れた者は、たちまち射抜かれてしまうそうだよ。

source:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_012Aha, that's it! “My dear, sweet beloved. Let me be the guardian to your ruins of Ronka, now and forevermore.”
Do you think she would accept such a proposal?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_012彼女らがロンカの護人として遺跡を護るように、
僕が彼女を、護ると誓うのはどうだい？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_013<tab>No...? Well, I will give it some thought. Come, let me show you another spot near Lake Tusi Mek'ta.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_013さて、次の候補地に向かおう。
次はトゥシ・メキタ湖が見える場所さ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_020<tab>Is the view of the lake not breathtaking?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_020ここが2箇所目の候補だよ。
トゥシ・メキタ湖がキレイに見えるだろう？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_021<tab>At its bottom rests the Covered Halls of Dwatl, one of several ruins of the Ronkan Empire.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_021この湖の底には、ダワトリ溺没神殿が沈んでいる。
その昔、この森をロンカ帝国が治めていたことの証拠だね。

source:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_022Ah! I have it now! “The ruin that is your love has sunk to the bottom of my heart. And there it shall remain for all time.”
The perfect proposal, don't you think?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_022悠久の歴史に思いを馳せながら、
ふたりの将来について話していくのはどうだろう？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_023<tab>No, you're right. The wording could use a little work. Perhaps my third choice of location will prove inspirational.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_023さて、次が最後の候補地だ。
トゥシ・メキタ湖の真ん中へ行こう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_030<tab>This is perhaps my favorite of the three. Simple, quiet, and peaceful.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_030ここが最後の候補だ。
この辺りは、人も滅多に立ち寄らないし、
身も心も落ち着くんだよね。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_031<tab>Hmmm... Perhaps that is all I need to propose─a simple expression of my love.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_031湖に囲まれ、静寂に包まれたこの場所なら、
僕の言葉にだけ、集中してもらうことができそうだろう？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_032<tab>I realize there is much to consider, so you needn't give me your opinion now. Let us give it due thought while we return to Slitherbough.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_032さて、これで候補地はすべて見て回れたね。
どの場所で告白するかを決める前に、
ひとまずスリザーバウに戻ろうか。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_040<tab>Thank goodness you're here. The more I think on it, the more uncertain I become. Tell me, which place do you think would help me win her heart?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_040一緒に候補地を回ってくれてありがとう。
君はどこで告白するのがいいと思った？

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_A1_000_001<tab>I think the view of Yx'Maja would be best.
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_A1_000_002<tab>The view from the edge of the lake was quite lovely.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_A1_000_002<tab>トゥシ・メキタ湖が見える場所

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_A1_000_003<tab>The calm and quiet at the lake's center would be perfect.
target: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_A1_000_003<tab>トゥシ・メキタ湖の真ん中

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_050<tab>I suppose there is a certain charm to that place. All right, that is where I'll propose.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_050イキス・マヤエの森が見えるあそこだね！
あそこなら古き血筋の民も祝福してくれるかも……。
よし、君のいうとおりにしよう！

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_060<tab>It was, wasn't it? And there'd be no risk of falling in if we remain at its edge. All right, that is where I'll propose.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_060トゥシ・メキタ湖が見えるあそこだね！
あそこなら悠久の歴史が僕に味方してくれるかも……。
よし、君のいうとおりにしよう！

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_070<tab>The center of the lake, eh? There would be nothing to distract me from telling her how I truly feel. All right, that is where I'll propose.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_070僕のお気に入りの場所か……。
たしかにあそこなら、告白しやすいかも。
よし、君のいうとおりにしよう！

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_080<tab>I was right to call upon you. What better place than that to offer her my true name.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_080ほかでもない魔女マトーヤが信を置く君のおすすめなら、
きっと告白も成功して、彼女も真名を教えてくれるよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_081<tab>...Are you not familiar with the custom? Only immediate family should know one's true name. It's the only way to protect our hearts from the Light.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_081知ってるかもしれないけれど、
僕たち「夜の民」は、偽名を使って過ごしているんだ。
本当の名前である「真名」を知ってるのは、家族くらいのもの。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_082<tab>Which is why revealing one's name to another is of such great significance. Though I suspect my choice of words in proposing may yet sour the moment.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_082つまり、他人同士が真名を教え合うっていうのは、
結婚の契りを結ぶってことを意味するのさ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_083<tab>But don't you worry. When the time is right, I'm certain the words will flow freely.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZE019_03453_HUNTER03453_000_083よーし、さっそく告白するとしよう！
ここまでつきあってくれて、ありがとうね！
